episodes.title: Is Your Company a Cult?
episodes.description:
Is your workplace truly supportive—or are you caught in something more manipulative than you realize?
In this solo episode, Marlo Lyons breaks down the difference between a healthy company culture and a full-blown company cult. From love bombing new hires to rewarding blind loyalty over actual performance, Marlo unpacks the subtle emotional manipulation tactics that can trap even the most high-performing professionals. She shares red flags to watch for, including over-identification with the company, fear of leadership, and transparency that’s more performative than real.
Whether you're feeling disillusioned at work or fiercely loyal to your team, this episode will help you pause and evaluate your loyalty, your well-being, and what you truly want from your career. Because a good company earns your respect—it doesn’t demand your worship.
